---
title: "happiness index starter"
author: "Calvin Peloso"
date: "2025-11-20"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
happiness <- read.csv("World Happiness Report 2005-2021.csv")
timeladder <- lm(Life.Ladder~Year+Log.GDP.per.capita+Social.support+Healthy.life.expectancy.at.birth+Freedom.to.make.life.choices+Generosity+Perceptions.of.corruption+Positive.affect+Negative.affect+Confidence.in.national.government,data=happiness)
summary(timeladder)
qqnorm(timeladder$residuals)
```
